text: Yemwe bantu! Nimutinye Nyagasani wanyu, we wabaremye abakomoye ku muntu umwe (Adamu), akamuremera umugore we [Hawa (Eva)] amumu- komoyemo; muri abo bombi abakomoraho abagabo benshi n’abagore. Ngaho nimutinye Allah we musabana ku bwe kandi (mutinye guca) imiryango. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Umugenzuzi wanyu
